mapper.insert: insert into books(booksid , booksname , image , cateid , publisher , author , addtime , storage , lendnum , weizhi , contents ) values(#{booksid} , #{booksname} , #{image} , #{cateid} , #{publisher} , #{author} , #{addtime} , #{storage} , #{lendnum} , #{weizhi} , #{contents} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.catename from books a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid order by booksid desc
select a.* , b.catename from books a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by booksid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from books a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by booksid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from books a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid and a.cateid=#{cateid} order by booksid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from books a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid and booksid=#{booksid} order by booksid desc
